short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple free utility for your browser that helps you decide how much to spend on your next transaction.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you keep track of the congestion on the Ethereum blockchain. It shows the latest fees so you can decide what's best for you to price your transactions.
